data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The tone of your text conveys an attitude. Whether ____ is ____ or ____, ____ attitude ____ be ____ determined ____ the ____ you ____ when ____ your ____. "Never include anything in the text you would be embarrassed if a large audience read" (Anderson, 261).
data.partBlankContent: The tone of your text conveys an attitude. Whether i_ is inten______ or uninte_______, yo__ attitude c__ be eas___ determined b_ the lang____ you u__ when addre_____ your rea___. "Never include anything in the text you would be embarrassed if a large audience read" (Anderson, 261).
data.fullContent: The tone of your text conveys an attitude. Whether it is intentional or unintentional, your attitude can be easily determined by the language you use when addressing your reader. "Never include anything in the text you would be embarrassed if a large audience read" (Anderson, 261).
data.answer: 文章的语气传达了一种态度。无论是有意的还是无意的，你的态度很容易由你在称呼读者时使用的语言决定。“永远不要在文本中包含任何会让很多观众读到的东西”(安德森，261)。
